ing: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
des: "Prepared in a slow cooker, this is a simple way to make roast beef and gravy. Serve with mashed potatoes and fruit salad for a complete meal."
ins:
Cut chuck roast in half; place in slow cooker. Combine cream of mushroom soup, beef broth, sherry, and soup mix in a bowl; pour over roast.
Cover and cook on Low until meat is tender, 8 to 9 hours.
